statements: SELECT * FROM energy_agreements WHERE agreement_id = 1;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date, end_date FROM energy_agreements WHERE energy_units > 100;
SELECT party1_address, party2_address, agreed_rate FROM energy_agreements WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM energy_agreements WHERE agreed_rate >= 50.00 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT agreement_id, party1_address, party2_address FROM energy_agreements ORDER BY agreement_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_agreements WHERE agreement_id = 1 AND start_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT agreement_name, energy_units, agreed_rate FROM energy_agreements WHERE energy_units > 1000 ORDER BY agreed_rate DESC
SELECT party1_address, party2_address FROM energy_agreements WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT agreement_name, energy_units * agreed_rate AS total_cost FROM energy_agreements WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY total_cost ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_agreements WHERE party1_address = '123 Main St' OR party2_address = '456 Elm St' AND energy_units >= 5000
SELECT * FROM EnergyContracts;
SELECT contract_name, energy_provider FROM EnergyContracts WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, end_date FROM EnergyContracts ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyTransactions WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM EnergyTransactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM EnergyContracts WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY energy_provider DESC, contract_name ASC;
SELECT contract_name, energy_provider, start_date FROM EnergyContracts WHERE energy_provider = 'ABC Energy' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, start_date, end_date FROM EnergyContracts WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyTransactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, status ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, contract_id, amount FROM EnergyTransactions WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Energy_Agreements;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date, energy_amount FROM Energy_Agreements WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Energy_Consumers ORDER BY consumer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, energy_cost FROM Energy_Transactions WHERE energy_cost > 1000;

SELECT agreement_name, consumer_name, transaction_date FROM Energy_Agreements JOIN Energy_Transactions ON Energy_Agreements.agreement_id = Energy_Transactions.agreement_id JOIN Energy_Consumers ON Energy_Consumers.consumer_id = Energy_Transactions.consumer_id;
SELECT * FROM Energy_Agreements ORDER BY start_date DESC, energy_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT agreement_name, energy_amount FROM Energy_Agreements WHERE energy_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Energy_Transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';

SELECT agreement_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM Energy_Agreements INNER JOIN Energy_Transactions ON Energy_Agreements.agreement_id = Energy_Transactions.agreement_id GROUP BY agreement_name;

SELECT consumer_name, SUM(energy_cost) AS total_cost FROM Energy_Consumers INNER JOIN Energy_Transactions ON Energy_Consumers.consumer_id = Energy_Transactions.consumer_id GROUP BY consumer_name ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyAgreements;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date, end_date FROM EnergyAgreements WHERE energy_amount > 1000;
SELECT buyer_id, seller_id, energy_amount FROM EnergyAgreements WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SmartMeters ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT meter_id, meter_type, customer_id FROM SmartMeters WHERE meter_type = 'Electric';
SELECT * FROM EnergyAgreements;
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_name, start_date, energy_amount FROM EnergyAgreements ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date, energy_amount FROM EnergyAgreements WHERE energy_amount > 1000 ORDER BY energy_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM SmartMeters WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT u.username, u.user_type, t.amount FROM Users u JOIN Transactions t ON u.user_id = t.agreement_id WHERE t.payment_status = true;
SELECT * FROM EnergyContract;
SELECT contract_name, start_date, end_date FROM EnergyContract WHERE energy_provider = 'ABC Energy';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, start_date, end_date, energy_provider, energy_consumer FROM EnergyContract WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EnergyTransactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, energy_type FROM EnergyProviders WHERE energy_type = 'Solar' ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyContract WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT contract_name, energy_consumer FROM EnergyContract WHERE energy_provider = 'ABC Energy'
SELECT transaction_id, total_price FROM EnergyTransactions WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY total_price DESC
SELECT provider_name, energy_type FROM EnergyProviders WHERE provider_name LIKE '%Solar%' ORDER BY provider_name
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumers WHERE energy_usage < 500 ORDER BY energy_usage ASC
